extendedInfo.description: KGUN9.com App Description: Get breaking news, weather and traffic alerts for Southern Arizona wherever you are with KGUN 9 On Your Side's App. KGUN 9's app offers extensive coverage of the stories that matter most. From Good Morning Tucson with Greg GurulÃ© and Corinne Hautala, to your evening news with Guy Atchley and Jennifer Waddell, the KGUN 9 app provides you with Arizona's news throughout the day powered by kgun9.com. App features include: -The latest weather forecast from the KGUN 9 First Warning Weather team with Chief Meteorologist Erin Christiansen, April Madison and Aaron Brackett. -All the latest You Ask, We Investigate coverage, plus 9 On Your Side Viewer's Voice, Border Watch, Immigration Watch, Education Watch and Consumer Watch news -Local and state politics and government -Sports information on your favorite teams with Sports Director Jason Barr and Kayla Anderson -Videos from our latest newscasts, as well as web exclusive videos -Traffic updates for your commute -Morning Blend video features with Ann Lauricello and Amanda Guralski -Station contests and promotions -A quick and easy way to submit your photos and videos to our station via iContribute Plus, you can easily share this content and connect to your friends and family using the Facebook feature on our app!

reviews.title: Weather portion is terrible
reviews.comment: Accessing weather on this app is terrible. It just takes you to the mobile website. Stop being lazy and fix it to how it was BEFORE. Even the commercial for this app shows the old, better working layout. Don\'t be fooled by false advertising!
reviews.author: Matt Y

reviews.title: Chets
reviews.comment: I watch 9 on your side all they r good
reviews.author: Chester George

reviews.title: Big
reviews.comment: I love this app shows so much
reviews.author: Chris Gigi

reviews.title: great info source
reviews.comment: I use it everyday for local Tucson news and weather.
reviews.author: Mary-Kay Nester

reviews.title: Well done. Great app.
reviews.comment: This one works and content well done.
reviews.author: Dan Swango

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Good entertainment and always updated
reviews.author: juan gutierrez

reviews.title: Portrait only!
reviews.comment: Please, give the option for landscape!
reviews.author: Gary Volk

reviews.comment: Some difficulties running the app possibly due to the
reviews.author: Mike Canizales

reviews.title: Very informative
reviews.comment: Great news app covering the Tucson market. App allowed me to follow up on the return of the cross country cat since my local news in Wisconsin didn\'t bother to. With all the terrible news in the world these days, for me to see that \'Ace\' made it home safe and sound brightened my day. Thank you KGUN 9!!
reviews.author: Peter Jasen

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: The only things i can access from the main menu are the news stories. No weather, no contests, no traffic... So frustrating. And the news stories are full of spelling mistakes, missing words and sentences that make absolutely no sense. Even sent an email and received a reply basically saying, \"thanks for letting us know but we can\'t fix everything.\" How unprofessional. Don\'t create an app if you have no desire to make it work correctly.
reviews.author: amanda gauthier

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this app because it keeps me up to date with latest local news. And I love KGUN9!
reviews.author: Mike N

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: It\'s not bad everything works well however, the spelling and grammer is not up to par with what I would believe a professional news team should aspire to but for free its not bad.
reviews.author: brandy twombly

reviews.title: Tucson Resident
reviews.comment: This is one of the apps I read every day. I just wish that it was updated a little more often.
reviews.author: Clay Ruge

reviews.comment: Good app a little slow but good app
reviews.author: Joshua Lloyd

reviews.title: No good
reviews.comment: Streaming audio does not work. Never has. Verizon GS 3
reviews.author: Jeremy Peters

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Cant zoom in on pictures and streaming the radio stations doesn\'t work most of the time  RAZR

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: It lets me stay informed

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Decent app. :-)

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: I\'ve been trying to listen to the radio station and since I downloaded the app I haven\'t been able to listen, please fix this problem. I\'ll rate better when it works.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: K- Gun news
reviews.comment: Nice to have, it\'s my favorite. Done well thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User
